import Data.Set (Set, (\\), intersection, elems, null, size, fromList)
import qualified Data.Set as S

main :: IO ()
main = interact $ unlines . map (show' . uncurry surrounding_area) . read' . lines
 where
  read' ("0 0":_) = []
  read' (wh:xs) = ((w,h),(black,white)) : read' xs'
   where
    [w,h] = map read (words wh)
    (m,xs') = splitAt h xs
    black = fromList [(x,y) | x<-[1..w], y<-[1..h], m!!(y-1)!!(x-1)=='B']
    white = fromList [(x,y) | x<-[1..w], y<-[1..h], m!!(y-1)!!(x-1)=='W']
  show' (b,w) = show b ++ " " ++ show w

type Grid = Set (Int,Int)

wasteland :: Int -> Int -> Grid
wasteland x y = fromList [(w,h) | w<-[1..x], h<-[1..y]]

surrounding_area :: (Int,Int) -> (Grid,Grid) -> (Int,Int)
surrounding_area (w,h) (black,white) = (nb,nw)
 where
  nb = if S.null black then 0 else untouched (wasteland w h \\ black) white
  nw = if S.null white then 0 else untouched (wasteland w h \\ white) black

untouched :: Grid -> Grid -> Int
untouched gw gp = size $ gw \\ (untilFix (survey gw) gp)

survey :: Grid -> Grid -> Grid
survey gw = intersection gw . expand

expand :: Grid -> Grid
expand = fromList . concatMap neighbor . elems

neighbor :: (Int,Int) -> [(Int,Int)]
neighbor (x,y) = [(x,y),(x-1,y),(x+1,y),(x,y-1),(x,y+1)]

untilFix :: Eq a => (a -> a) -> a -> a
untilFix f x = if f x == x then x else untilFix f (f x)

D = [[1,0],[0,-1],[-1,0],[0,1]]

def dfs(x, y)
  if $fld[y][x] == "B"
    $flag_b = true 
    return
  end
  if $fld[y][x] == "W"
    $flag_w = true
    return
  end
  $vst[y][x] = true
  D.each do |dx, dy|
    nx, ny = x + dx, y + dy
    if nx >= 0 && nx < $w && ny >= 0 && ny < $h && $vst[ny][nx].nil?
      dfs(nx, ny)
    end
  end
end

loop do
  $w, $h = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  break if $w == 0
  $fld = $h.times.map{ gets.chomp.split("") }
  cw = cb = 0
  for i in (0...$w)
    for j in (0...$h)
      $vst = $h.times.map{ [nil]*$w }
      $flag_b = $flag_w = false
      dfs(i, j) unless $fld[j][i] == "B" || $fld[j][i] == "W" 
      cb += 1 if $flag_b && !$flag_w
      cw += 1 if !$flag_b && $flag_w
    end
  end
  puts "#{cb} #{cw}"
end

class UnionFind
	def initialize
		@obj_to_node = {}
	end

	def add(obj)
		@obj_to_node[obj] ||= Node.new(obj)
	end

	def size(x = nil)
		x ? @obj_to_node[x].root.size : @obj_to_node.size
	end

	class Node
		def initialize(obj)
			@obj = obj
			@parent = self
			@size = 1
		end

		def root
			return self if @parent == self
			@parent = @parent.root
		end	

		attr_accessor :parent, :size
	end

	def union(x, y)
		u = (@obj_to_node[x] ||= Node.new(x)).root
		v = (@obj_to_node[y] ||= Node.new(y)).root
		return if u == v
		u.parent = v.root
		v.size += u.size
	end

	def same?(x, y)
		return false unless u = @obj_to_node[x]
		return false unless v = @obj_to_node[y]
		u.root == v.root
	end

	def root_of(x)
		u = @obj_to_node[x]
		u ? u.root : nil
	end
end

require 'set'
loop {
	w, h = gets.split.map &:to_i
	break if w == 0
	a = (1..h).map{ gets.chomp.split("") }
	color = (1..h).map{ (1..w).map{ Set.new } }
	uf = UnionFind.new
	(0..h-1).each{|i|
		(0..w-1).each{|j|
			uf.add([i,j])
			if i < h-1
				color[i][j] << :w if a[i][j] == ?. && a[i+1][j] == ?W
				color[i][j] << :b if a[i][j] == ?. && a[i+1][j] == ?B
				color[i+1][j] << :w if a[i+1][j] == ?. && a[i][j] == ?W
				color[i+1][j] << :b if a[i+1][j] == ?. && a[i][j] == ?B
				uf.union([i,j], [i+1, j]) if a[i][j] == ?. && a[i+1][j] == ?.
			end
			if j < w-1
				color[i][j] << :w if a[i][j] == ?. && a[i][j+1] == ?W
				color[i][j] << :b if a[i][j] == ?. && a[i][j+1] == ?B
				color[i][j+1] << :w if a[i][j+1] == ?. && a[i][j] == ?W
				color[i][j+1] << :b if a[i][j+1] == ?. && a[i][j] == ?B
				uf.union([i,j], [i, j+1]) if a[i][j] == ?. && a[i][j+1] == ?.
			end
		}
	}

	hash = {}
	(0..h-1).each{|i|
		(0..w-1).each{|j|
			r = uf.root_of([i,j])
			hash[r] ||= Set.new
			hash[r] += color[i][j]
		}
	}
	white = black = 0
	hash.each{|r, cs|
		next unless r
		white += r.size if cs.to_a == [:w]
		black += r.size if cs.to_a == [:b]
	}
	puts "#{black} #{white}"
}

while true
    @w,@h=gets.split(" ").map(&:to_i)
    if @w==0
        break
    end
    a=(0...@h).map{gets}
    @flag=Array.new(@h).map{Array.new(@w,0)}
    @h.times do |i|
        @w.times do |j|
            if a[i][j]=='W'
                @flag[i][j]|=1
            elsif a[i][j]=='B'
                @flag[i][j]|=2
            end
        end
    end
    def solve(x,y,c)
        dx=[0,1,0,-1]
        dy=[1,0,-1,0]
        4.times do |i|
            if x+dx[i]<0||x+dx[i]>=@w||y+dy[i]<0||y+dy[i]>=@h
                next
            end
            if @flag[y+dy[i]][x+dx[i]]&3>0
                next
            end
            if @flag[y+dy[i]][x+dx[i]]&c>0
                next
            end
            @flag[y+dy[i]][x+dx[i]]|=c
            solve(x+dx[i],y+dy[i],c)
        end
    end
    @h.times do |i|
        @w.times do |j|
            if @flag[i][j]==1
                solve(j,i,4)
            elsif @flag[i][j]==2
                solve(j,i,8)
            end
        end
    end
    bcnt=0
    wcnt=0
    @h.times do |i|
        @w.times do |j|
            if @flag[i][j]&15==4
                wcnt+=1
            elsif @flag[i][j]&15==8
                bcnt+=1
            end
        end
    end
    print("#{bcnt} #{wcnt}\n")
end

$dx = [0,1,0,-1]
$dy = [1,0,-1,0]
def bfs(f, sy, sx, h, w)
    q = [[sy,sx]]
    visited = [[sy,sx]]
    col = f[sy][sx].downcase
    while q.size > 0
        sy, sx = q.shift
        for i in 0..3
            cy = sy + $dy[i]
            cx = sx + $dx[i]
            if cy.between?(0,h-1) && cx.between?(0,w-1) && f[cy][cx] != "W" && f[cy][cx] != "B" && !visited.include?([cy,cx])
                q.push([cy,cx])
                visited.push([cy,cx])
                if f[cy][cx] == "."
                    f[cy][cx] = col
                elsif f[cy][cx] != col
                    f[cy][cx] = "*" 
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return f
end
def pp(f)
    f.each do |r|
        puts r
    end
    puts
end
loop do
    w, h = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    break if w == 0 && h == 0
    f = h.times.map{gets.strip}
    h.times do |i|
        w.times do |j|
            next if f[i][j] != "W" && f[i][j] != "B"
            f = bfs(f,i,j,h,w)
        end
    end
    wc = bc = 0
    h.times do |i|
        w.times do |j|
            wc += 1 if f[i][j] == "w"
            bc += 1 if f[i][j] == "b"
        end
    end
    puts "#{bc} #{wc}"
end

D = [[1,0],[0,-1],[-1,0],[0,1]]
 
def dfs(x, y)
  if $fld[y][x] == "B"
    $flag_b = true
    return
  elsif $fld[y][x] == "W"
    $flag_w = true
    return
  end
  $cnt += 1
  $vst[y][x] = true
  D.each do |dx, dy|
    nx, ny = x + dx, y + dy
    if nx >= 0 && nx < $w && ny >= 0 && ny < $h && !$vst[ny][nx]
      dfs(nx, ny)
    end
  end
end
 
loop do
  $w, $h = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  break if $w == 0
  $fld = $h.times.map{ gets.chomp.split("") }
  
  cw = cb = 0
  $vst = $h.times.map{ [false]*$w }
  for i in (0...$h)
    for j in (0...$w)
      if $fld[i][j] == "." && !$vst[i][j]
        $flag_b = $flag_w = false
        $cnt = 0
        dfs(j, i) 
        cb += $cnt if $flag_b && !$flag_w
        cw += $cnt if !$flag_b && $flag_w
      end
    end
  end
  puts "#{cb} #{cw}"
end

$dx = [0,1,0,-1]
$dy = [1,0,-1,0]
$bc = 0
$wc = 0
def bfs(f, sy, sx, h, w, visited, bc, wc)
    f[sy][sx] = "*"
    wf = false
    bf = false
    count = 1
    q = [[sy,sx]]
    visited.push([sy,sx])
    col = f[sy][sx].downcase
    while q.size > 0
        sy, sx = q.shift
        for i in 0..3
            cy = sy + $dy[i]
            cx = sx + $dx[i]
            if cy.between?(0,h-1) && cx.between?(0,w-1) && !visited.include?([cy,cx])
                if  f[cy][cx] == "W"
                    wf = true
                elsif
                    f[cy][cx] == "B"
                    bf = true
                elsif
                    count += 1
                    q.push([cy,cx])
                    visited.push([cy,cx])
                    f[cy][cx] = "*"
                end
            end
        end
    end
    bc += count if bf && !wf
    wc += count if !bf && wf
    return [f,visited,bc,wc]
end

    end
    puts

loop do
    w, h = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    break if w == 0 && h == 0
    f = h.times.map{gets.strip}
    visited = []
    bc = wc = 0
    h.times do |i|
        w.times do |j|
            next if f[i][j] == "W" || f[i][j] == "B" || visited.include?([i,j])
            f, visited, bc, wc = bfs(f,i,j,h,w,visited,bc,wc)
        end
    end
    puts "#{bc} #{wc}"
end

$field
$visited
$cnt
$b_flg
$w_flg
$w
$h
$dy = Array[0, -1, 0, 1]
$dx = Array[1, 0, -1, 0]

def search(i, j)
  $cnt += 1
  $visited[i][j] = true

  for k in 0...4
    y = i + $dy[k]
    x = j + $dx[k]
    if y < 0 || $h <= y
      next
    end
    if x < 0 || $w <= x
      next
    end
    if $visited[y][x]
      next
    end
    if $field[y][x] == 'B'
      $b_flg = true
    elsif $field[y][x] == 'W'
      $w_flg = true
    else
      search(y, x)
    end
  end
end

loop do
  $w, $h = gets.chomp.split.map(&:to_i)

  if $w == 0 && $h == 0
    break;
  end

  $field = Array.new($h)
  $visited = Array.new($h)

  for i in 0...$h
    $field[i] = gets.chomp.split(//).map(&:to_s)
    $visited[i] = Array.new($w, false)
  end

  ans_b = ans_w = 0

  for i in 0...$h
    for j in 0...$w
      if $field[i][j] == '.' && !$visited[i][j]
        $b_flg = $w_flg = false
        $cnt = 0
        search(i, j)
        if $b_flg && !$w_flg
          ans_b += $cnt
        elsif !$b_flg && $w_flg
          ans_w += $cnt
        end
      end
    end
  end

  puts "#{ans_b} #{ans_w}"
end

from collections import deque

dxs = [1,0,-1,0]
dys = [0,1,0,-1]
def bfs(x,y,c):
    q = deque([(x,y)])
    while q:
        x,y = q.popleft()
        for dx,dy in zip(dxs,dys):
            nx,ny = x+dx,y+dy
            if nx < 0 or nx >= W or ny < 0 or ny >= H: continue
            if src[ny][nx] != '.' or mem[c][ny][nx]: continue
            q.append((nx,ny))
            mem[c][ny][nx] = 1

while True:
    W,H = map(int,input().split())
    if W == 0: break
    src = [input() for i in range(H)]
    mem = [[[0 for w in range(W)] for h in range(H)] for c in range(2)]
    for y in range(H):
        for x in range(W):
            if src[y][x] == '.': continue
            c = (0 if src[y][x] == 'B' else 1)
            bfs(x,y,c)
    b = w = 0
    for y in range(H):
        for x in range(W):
            bm,wm = mem[0][y][x], mem[1][y][x]
            if bm and not wm: b += 1
            elif wm and not bm: w += 1
    print(str(b) + ' ' + str(w))
